name: Branle-Bas De Combat !
description:
Ready to be part of a Pirate's naval battle ?  You should :)

Fill your cannons with the cannonballs and send back enemy's one by using the trampoline !

Controls:

  • WASD or ARROW KEYS for movement
  • E or SPACE for pickup / drop / use

Made in 2 days as a personal challenge with the Godot Engine. I took a little bit more time to polish it (music, player's animation, etc...).

Screenshots are not updated yet :)
